name: Camco Brass Marine/RV Water Pressure Regulator – Protects RV Kitchen Small Appliances, Plumbing & Hoses – Reduces RV Water Pressure to Safe & Consistent 40-50 PSI – Drinking Water Safe (40055)
short_description: Protects RV/Marine Plumbing: Keep your RV/marine plumbing safe with this brass Camco water pressure regulator. Safeguard against high-pressure city water to protect your hoses & plumbing from potential damage.
Automatic Pipe Burst Protection: Ensure your pipes are safe using the built-in PSI Guard, preset at 40-50 PSI for automatic burst protection. (Maximum incoming pressure is 125 PSI.)
Safe for Drinking Water: Camco’s pressure regulator for RV water hoses is drinking water safe. It’s a must-have camper tool for setups that require outstanding water quality.

Certified Lead-Free: This water regulator for RV campers is crafted from high-quality brass material. It is CSA lead-free content certified to NSF/ANSI 372 & compliant with all federal & state-level lead-free laws.
Patented Technology: Expertly crafted, this patented RV accessory has undergone extensive testing and quality control to meet the highest standards.
Simple Setup: Easily attach the camper water pressure regulator to 3/4" garden hose threads for hassle-free water maintenance. For outdoor use only.
product_description: Protect your RV or boat's plumbing with the Camco Brass RV Water Pressure Regulator. This RV must-have lowers city water pressure to a safe level before it reaches your appliances, fixtures, or plumbing system. Made from durable, lead-free brass, it's safe for drinking water. The pressure comes pre-set for optimal water flow— protecting your valuable equipment and extending their lifespan. Installation is a breeze with standard garden hose threads. Experience worry-free adventures with Camco’s brass water pressure regulator for RV campers. Enjoy safe water pressure throughout all your travels with this camper must-have!

short_description: - Functionality: STMOUTUO RV water pressure regulator is designed to prevent damage to plumbing systems caused by high pressure, making it highly suitable for RV camper, yard irrigation systems, home , trailers. name: Water Pressure Regulator, 3/4 Inch NPT Thread DN20, Heavy Duty Brass Lead-free BPA-free, with Gauge for Home
short_description: 【Premium Lead-Free & BPA-Free Brass Construction】Crafted from 100% high-strength, heavy-duty brass, 3/4“ NPT thread, this pressure reducing valve is completely rust-proof and corrosion-resistant. It is built to deliver reliable performance for many years, even under high pressure and high-temperature conditions.

【All-in-One Kit with Pressure Gauge】This complete kit includes everything you need for installation: 1 pressure reducer, 1 pressure gauge, 1 wrench, and 1 sealing tape. The integrated gauge allows you to monitor water pressure in real-time for optimal system performance.

【Precise Pressure Regulation & Durable Piston Design】Engineered with an efficient piston structure, this valve provides accurate and stable pressure control. The simple, robust internal mechanism ensures excellent performance and a long service life in various environments.

【Wide-Range Application for Home & More】This versatile 3/4" water pressure regulator for home is rated for up to 250 PSI (1.6 MPa). It's ideal for protecting faucets, water heaters, water purifiers, and other appliances in households, commercial buildings, and factories.

【Easy Installation & Operation】Designed for a hassle-free setup with standard 3/4-inch connections. The included wrench and sealing tape make installation straightforward, ensuring you can get it up and running quickly and efficiently.

【Heavy-Duty Performance for Reliable Protection】Safeguard your plumbing system from damaging high pressure. This heavy-duty pressure reducing valve 3/4 ensures consistent, lower water pressure, preventing leaks and extending the life of your pipes and appliances.

【Rugged Build for Long-Term Use】The solid brass body offers superior strength and durability. This corrosion-resistant construction guarantees that the valve will be a long-lasting solution for your water pressure management needs.

【Reliable Support with Gauge Warranty】We stand behind our product. We offer one year quality warranty.If the pressure gauge is damaged during shipping or fails during use, contact us for a free replacement. We are committed to your satisfaction.
product_description: Take control of your home's water pressure with the Valquave Water Pressure Regulator. This heavy-duty 3/4-inch (DN20) regulating valve is engineered for reliable performance and precise pressure control. Constructed from durable brass material, this lead-free and BPA-free regulator comes equipped with an easy-to-read pressure gauge for accurate monitoring. The regulator helps protect your plumbing system and appliances from excessive pressure, potentially extending their lifespan. Perfect for residential applications, this robust pressure regulator ensures consistent water flow throughout your home. Its professional-grade construction makes it suitable for long-term use, while the included gauge allows for quick pressure checks and adjustments. The 3/4-inch connection size is compatible with standard residential plumbing systems, making installation straightforward for qualified professionals. name: Cash Acme EB45 Pressure Regulating Valve with Disconnect Clip, Direct, 3/4 Inch Push to Connect, Poly Top, 60 PSI, Compatible with SharkBite, PVA16P-DSB-60
short_description: CASH ACME WATER PRESSURE REGULATOR: The Cash Acme Direct Pressure Regulating Valve (PRV)is designed to reduce incoming water pressure as well as prevent pressure surges to protect plumbing components. The valve offers simplicity and maintenance benefits of a cartridge-based valve while preserving the construction of a traditional regulator with a separate spring chamber and adjusting screw

DESIGN: This compact, inline 3/4 in. push fit direct SharkBite pressure regulating valve features EB45’s tamper-resistant design that lets you lock in the desired system pressure. This protects against accidental setting adjustments and ensures water stays at a safe pressure

MATERIAL: This regulating valve is made from brass, stainless steel and durable polymer components to withstand corrosion, compliant with NSF/ANSI 372 for safe use in potable water systems, meeting all drinking water regulations

EASY TO USE: This water pressure-reducing valve features a push-to-connect design for quick, tool-free installation. Just insert the pipe, and the stainless steel teeth grip tightly while the O-ring compresses for a secure, leak-free seal. Easily disassemble using SharkBite disconnect clip (included)
RATING: The water pressure reducer valve is rated to 60 PSI and is easily adjustable between 10 to 70 PSI; Suited for either cold or hot (to 180 degrees F) water service; Assembled in the USA
product_description: Keep water pressure regulated in any commercial or residential setting with this direct pressure regulating valve. Designed to prevent surges and maintain consistent flow, this water pressure regulator features a tamper-resistant EB45 design that locks in the desired pressure. The push-to-connect mechanism allows for quick, tool-free installation—just insert the pipe, and the stainless steel teeth grip tightly while the O-ring compresses for a secured seal. Easily removable with the included SharkBite disconnect clip, this regulating valve is made from lead-free and durable brass. Rated to 60 PSI and adjustable from 10 to 70 PSI, these regulating valves support both hot and cold water up to 180 degrees F.

The adjustable water pressure regulator allows you to finely tune output from 0-140 PSI with a simple screwdriver, providing reliable protection for plumbing systems against damaging high pressure. This robust construction offers superior rust resistance and strength, making this pressure reducing valve 1/2 inch suitable for demanding applications in Chemical Industry, food processing, and harsh environments, far outperforming standard brass valves.

【Versatile & Multi-Purpose Application】 A true all-in-one solution for water pressure management. Functions perfectly as an RV water pressure regulator to protect your camper. This water pressure reducing valve ensures balanced pressure across various settings.
